name: Ancient Brass Dragon
movement: 40 ft. on land, 40 ft. burrow, 80 ft. flying
description: The Ancient Brass Dragon has dull, tarnished brass-colored scales that shimmer in sunlight, embodying wisdom and knowledge. It is a large, powerful creature with the ability to breathe fire and cast various spells.
memorable: Known for its love of conversation and storytelling, it embodies both fire and wisdom, making it a unique blend of a formidable combatant and a cunning scholar.
goals: To gather knowledge, engage in meaningful conversations, and protect its territory while avoiding unnecessary violence.
relations: Often associated with other dragons, adventurers seeking knowledge, and beings that respect wisdom.
environment: Hot, dry environments like deserts, typically residing in vast labyrinthine caves.
strengths: Possesses high hit points, significant magical abilities, and exceptional resilience due to legendary resistance and fire immunity.
weaknesses: Poor Dexterity score may make it vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Uses a multiattack incorporating bite and claw strikes, capable of dealing devastating fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Breath Weapons, capable of lethal fire damage or incapacitating foes with sleep gas.
senses: Possesses blindsight and passive Perception of 24, allowing it to detect threats even in darkness.
skills: Skilled in History and Persuasion, demonstrating high knowledge and social capability.
additional_information: Can use Change Shape to transform into humanoid or beast forms.
Legendary Resistance three times per day allows it to succeed on failed saving throws.
The Suffocating Heat aura impacts creatures within 30 feet, requiring a DC to resist damage.
Incorporates a tactical elements in combat, such as Frightful Presence to intimidate enemies.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting abilities include spells like comprehend languages, identify, and teleport, showcasing versatility and cunning.
